00008 function isValidURL($url)
00009 {
00010         return preg_match('|^http(s)?://[a-z0-9-]+(.[a-z0-9-]+)*(:[0-9]+)?(/.*)?$|i', $url);
00011 }

00013 
00014 function url_exists($url)
00015 {
00016         $handle = @fopen($url, "r");
00017         if ($handle === false)
00018                 return false;
00019         fclose($handle);
00020         return true;
00021 }

00024 function clean_num($num)
00025 {
00026         return rtrim(rtrim($num, '0'), '.');
00027 }

00030 function nl($howMany=1) 
00031 {
00032         for ($i=0; $i<$howMany; $i++)
00033         {
00034                 echo "<br/>";
00035         }
00036 }

00039 function ws($howMany=1)
00040 {
00041         for ($i=0; $i<$howMany; $i++)
00042         {
00043                 echo "&nbsp;";
00044         }
00045 }

00048 // HTML GENERAL TAG function
00049 // *****************************
00050 function makeTAG($TAG, $content, $args="") 
00051 {
00052     return ('<'.$TAG.' '.$args.'>'.$content.'</'.$TAG.'>');
00053 }
00054 
00055 // *****************************
00056 // HTML TAG TAGS functions
00057 // *****************************
00058 function makeTR($content, $args="") 
00059 {
00060     return makeTAG("tr",$content,$args);
00061 }

00068 function makeInputTitle($title, $info=NULL, $mandatory=false)
00069 {
00070         ($mandatory == true) ? ($content = "<b class='red'>*</b><b>") : ($content = "<b>&nbsp;&nbsp;");
00071         $content .= "&nbsp;" . $title . "</b>&nbsp;" . $info;
00072         return $content;
00073 }
00074 
00076 function makeInputText_($name, $value, $size=10, $class=NULL, $info=NULL)
00077 {
00078     $content = "<input name='" . $name . "' ";
00079         if($class != NULL) $content .=  "class='" . $class . "' ";
00080         $content .= "value='" . $value . "' size='" . $size . "'/>";
00081     if($info != NULL ) $content .= "&nbsp;<b>" . $info . "</b>"; 
00082     return $content;
00083 }
00084 
00085 function makeCheckBox($name, $value=false)
00086 {
00087         $content = "<input name='" . $name . "' type='checkbox' value='1' ";
00088         if($value) $content .= "checked='checked'";
00089     $content .= "/>";
00090     return $content;
00091 }
00092 
00095 function makeSelectListFromArray_($name, $value, $items, $column, $options=array())
00096 {
00097         $content =  "<select name='". $name ."'>" . LF;
00098         foreach($options as $option)
00099                 $content .= $option . LF;
00100         foreach($items['id'] as $key => $item)
00101         {
00102                 $content .= "<option value='" . $item . "'";
00103                 if ($item == $value) $content .= " selected='selected'";
00104                 if(is_array($column))
00105                     $content .= ">" . $items[$column[0]][$key] . " (" . $items[$column[1]][$key] . ")" . "</option>" . LF;
00106                 else
00107                 $content .= ">" . $items[$column][$key] . "</option>" . LF;
00108         }
00109         $content .= "</select>";
00110         return $content;
00111 }

00114 function makeSimpleSelectListFromArray_($name, $value, $items)
00115 {
00116         $content =  "<select name='". $name ."'>" . LF;
00117         foreach($items as $item)
00118         {
00119                 $content .= "<option value='" . $item . "'";
00120                 if ($item == $value) $content .= " selected='selected'";
00121         $content .= ">" . $item . "</option>" . LF;
00122         }
00123         $content .= "</select>";
00124         return $content;
00125 }

00184 function printmultipleCheckBoxRow($name, $items)
00185 {
00186         print "<tr>";
00187         $iterator = 0;
00188         foreach ($items as $key => $value)
00189         {
00190                 print "<td align='center'><b>". ucfirst(str_replace("_", " ", $key)) . "&nbsp;</b>" .
00191                 makeCheckBox($name . "_" . $iterator, $value);
00192         print "</td>" . LF;
00193         $iterator++;
00194         }
00195         print "</tr>" . LF;
00196 }

00226 function printTypeSelectListFromArray($title, $name, $value, $items, $column, $info=NULL, $mandatory=false, $options=array())
00227 {
00228         print "<tr>";
00229         printInputTitleCol($title, $info, $mandatory);
00230         print "<td align='left'><select name='{$name}'>" . LF;
00231         if(array_key_exists("top", $options))
00232                 print $options["top"];
00233         foreach($items['id'] as $key => $item)
00234         {
00235                 print "<option value='" . $item . "'";
00236                 if ($item == $value) print " selected='selected'";
00237         print ">" . $items[$column][$key] . "</option>" . LF;
00238         }
00239         if(array_key_exists("bottom", $options))
00240                 print $options["bottom"];
00241         print "</select></td></tr>" . LF;
00242 }

00245 function printBigSelectListFromArray($title, $name, $value, $items, $column, $info=NULL, $mandatory=false, $options=array())
00246 {
00247         print "<tr>";
00248         printInputTitleCol($title, $info, $mandatory);  
00249         print "<td align='left'><select name='{$name}' multiple='multiple' size='15'>" . LF;
00250         foreach($options as $option)
00251                 print $option;
00252         foreach($items['id'] as $key => $item)
00253         {
00254                 print "<option value='" . $item . "'";
00255                 //PROOF IF THIS IS AN ARRAY!
00256         if(is_array($value))
00257                 if(in_array($item, $value))
00258                         print " selected='selected'";
00259         print ">" . $items[$column][$key] . "</option>" . LF;
00260         }
00261         print "</select></td></tr>" . LF;
00262 }

00264 function printAddRemoveButton($count, $amount, $class, $table=true)
00265 {
00266         if($table)
00267         {
00268                 if($count == (count($amount) - 1))
00269                         print "<table class='{$class}_button'><tr><td><a class='add_{$class}' href=''>Add " . ucfirst($class) . "</a></td></tr></table>";
00270                 else
00271                 print "<table class='{$class}_button'><tr><td><a class='remove_{$class}' href=''>Delete " . ucfirst($class) . "</a></td></tr></table>";
00272         }
00273         else
00274         {
00275                 print "<td>";
00276                 if($count == (count($amount) - 1))
00277                         print "<a class='add_{$class}' href=''>Add</a>";
00278                 else
00279                 print "<a class='remove_{$class}' href=''>Del</a>";     
00280         print "</td>";
00281         }
00282 }
00283 
00284 function printActionButton($action)
00285 {
00286         //nl();
00287         //Define the action buttons
00288         print "<div class='actionbutton'>" . LF;
00289         //IF ACTION IS ADD
00290         if ($action == "add")
00291                 print "<input type='submit' name='push' value='Add Entry' class='submit'/>" . LF;
00292         //IF ACTION IS EDIT
00293         else if ($action == "edit")
00294                 print "<input type='submit' name='push' value='Update Entry'/>" . LF;
00295         print "</div>" . LF;
00296 }

00298 function printEditAllTable($name, $resources, $type)
00299 {
00300         if (empty($resources))
00301                 print "<h3>There are no {$name} entries to edit.</h3>" . LF;    
00302         else
00303         {
00304                 print "<table class='viewall'>" . LF;
00305         print "<caption>To edit please click on the {$name} name</caption>" . LF;
00306         print "<tr><th>ID</th><th>NAME</th><th>CREATION DATE</th><th>MODIFICATION DATE</th></tr>" . LF;
00307         $index = 0;
00308         foreach ($resources as $entry)
00309         {
00310                         if($index % 2) 
00311                                 print "<tr class='even'>";
00312                         else
00313                                 print "<tr class='odd'>";
00314                         print "<td>" . $entry["id"] . "</td>";
00315                 print "<td><a title='Click to edit' class='hand' " .
00316                 "href='index.php?page=add&amp;action=edit&amp;id=" . $entry["id"] . "&amp;res_type={$type}" .
00317                 "'>" . $entry["name"] . "</a></td>";
00318                 print "<td>" . $entry["creation_date"] . "</td>";
00319                 print "<td>" . $entry["modification_date"] . "</td>";
00320                 print "</tr>" . LF;
00321                 
00322                 $index++;
00323         }
00324         print "</table>" . LF;
00325         }       
00326 }
